entities.description: A survey section focusing on periods of depression lasting two weeks or longer.
The exact age of the respondent when a 2+ week period of depression started.
The number of times the respondent felt depressed in their life for two weeks or longer.
If the respondent experienced a two-week period of depression with other problems in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Relates to the age of the respondent when a 2+ week period of depression started.
Relates to the count of times the respondent felt depressed for two weeks or longer.
Indicates whether the respondent had a period of depression with other problems in the past year.
